scripts.export:wp-content: npm run cli 'rm -rf .export/wp-content' && mkdir -p .export/wp-content/uploads && run-p export:wp-content:*
scripts.test:unit:php: wp-env run composer run-script install-theme && wp-env run phpunit 'phpunit -c /var/www/html/wp-content/plugins/snow-monkey-heading-widget-area/.phpunit.xml.dist --verbose'
scripts.zip:pack: rsync -a --exclude='/vendor' --exclude='/node_modules' --exclude='.*' --exclude='*.ruleset.xml' --exclude='*.config.js' --exclude='*.xml.dist' --exclude='/bin' --exclude='/tests' --exclude='package*.json' . snow-monkey-heading-widget-area && wp-env start && wp-env run composer 'install --no-dev -d snow-monkey-heading-widget-area'
scripts.zip: npm run clean:zip && npm run zip:pack && npm run zip:archive
